SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT43_SNK
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent to the user by the system to refuse an 03 Select Command. From: GPA To: User
Notes The Basic Header identifies the SELECT Request message which is being negatively acknowledged.

SystemField.Name: application-id
SystemField.description:
Application Identifier, where:
a) F = FIN application
b) A/L = GPA application
c) X = all applications

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: application-id
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Application Identifier, where:
a) F = FIN application
b) A/L = GPA application
c) X = all applications

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Application Identifier '" + $value + "'. Valid Application Identifier values are : F, A, L, X."

SystemField.Name: error-code-l/s
SystemField.description: Reason why the Select was rejected. Error code is in the form Snn where nn is a two-digit number. See the FIN Error Codes for the full set of error codes.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: error-code-l/s
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Reason why the Select was rejected. Error code is in the form Snn where nn is a two-digit number. See the FIN Error Codes for the full set of error codes.

SystemField.Name: date-time
SystemField.description: Date and time, local to the user, of the rejection.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: date-time
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Date and time are always given as local, unless otherwise specified. Local time for the SWIFTNetwork is in GMT.
